00104 BOOLEAN EnterInsuranceInfo()
00105 {
00106   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00107       UINT16                              usPosX;
00108 
00109       InitInsuranceDefaults();
00110 
00111       // load the Insurance bullet graphic and add it
00112       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00113       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\bullet.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00114       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBulletImage));
00115 
00116 
00117       //left arrow
00118       guiInsPrevButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\InsLeftButton.sti", 2,0,-1,1,-1 );
00119       guiInsPrevBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsPrevButtonImage, InsInfoText[INS_INFO_PREVIOUS], INS_FONT_BIG, 
00120                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00121                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00122                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00123                                                                                INS_INFO_LEFT_ARROW_BUTTON_X, INS_INFO_LEFT_ARROW_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00124                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsPrevButtonCallback);
00125       SetButtonCursor( guiInsPrevBackButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00126       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiInsPrevBackButton, 17, 16, FALSE );
00127 
00128 
00129       //Right arrow
00130       guiInsNextButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\InsRightButton.sti", 2,0,-1,1,-1 );
00131       guiInsNextBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsNextButtonImage, InsInfoText[INS_INFO_NEXT], INS_FONT_BIG, 
00132                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00133                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00134                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00135                                                                                INS_INFO_RIGHT_ARROW_BUTTON_X, INS_INFO_RIGHT_ARROW_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00136                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsNextButtonCallback);
00137       SetButtonCursor( guiInsNextBackButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00138       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiInsNextBackButton, 18, 16, FALSE );
00139 
00140 
00141       usPosX = INS_INFO_LINK_START_X;
00142       //link to go to the contract page
00143       //link to go to the home page
00144       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceInfoHomeLinkRegion, usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y-37, (UINT16)(usPosX + INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH), INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y+2, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00145                                CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceInfoHomeLinkRegionCallBack); 
00146       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceInfoHomeLinkRegion); 
00147 
00148       usPosX += INS_INFO_LINK_START_OFFSET + INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH;
00149       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceInfoLinkRegion, usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y-37, (UINT16)(usPosX + INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH), INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y+2, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00150                                CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceLinkRegionCallBack); 
00151       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceInfoLinkRegion); 
00152 
00153 
00154       gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage = INS_INFO_INFO_TOC;
00155 
00156       RenderInsuranceInfo();
00157 
00158       return(TRUE);
00159 }

00161 void ExitInsuranceInfo()
00162 {
00163       RemoveInsuranceDefaults();
00164 
00165 
00166       UnloadButtonImage( guiInsPrevButtonImage );
00167       RemoveButton( guiInsPrevBackButton );
00168 
00169       UnloadButtonImage( guiInsNextButtonImage );
00170       RemoveButton( guiInsNextBackButton );
00171 
00172       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceInfoLinkRegion);
00173       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceInfoHomeLinkRegion);
00174 
00175       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBulletImage );
00176 }

00183 void RenderInsuranceInfo()
00184 {
00185       wchar_t           sText[800];
00186       UINT16 usNewLineOffset = 0;
00187       UINT16            usPosX;
00188 
00189       DisableArrowButtonsIfOnLastOrFirstPage();
00190 
00191       DisplayInsuranceDefaults();
00192 
00193       SetFontShadow( INS_FONT_SHADOW );
00194 
00195 
00196       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00197       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_LINE_Y, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X+INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_LINE_WIDTH, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_LINE_Y);
00198 
00199       switch( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage )
00200       {
00201             case INS_INFO_INFO_TOC:
00202                   DisplayInfoTocPage();
00203                   break;
00204 
00205             case INS_INFO_SUBMIT_CLAIM:
00206                   DisplaySubmitClaimPage();
00207                   break;
00208 
00209             case INS_INFO_PREMIUMS:
00210                   DisplayPremiumPage();
00211                   break;
00212 
00213             case INS_INFO_RENEWL:
00214                   DisplayRenewingPremiumPage();
00215                   break;
00216 
00217             case INS_INFO_CANCELATION:
00218                   DisplayCancelationPagePage();
00219                   break;
00220       }
00221 
00222       usPosX = INS_INFO_LINK_START_X;
00223 
00224       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom.  and the text
00225       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH), INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y);
00226       swprintf( sText, L"%s", pMessageStrings[ MSG_HOMEPAGE ] ); 
00227       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_TEXT_Y+14, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00228       usPosX += INS_INFO_LINK_START_OFFSET + INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH;
00229 
00230       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom.  and the text
00231       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH), INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_Y);
00232       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_TO_ENTER_REVIEW, sText );
00233       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_TEXT_Y, INS_INFO_LINK_TO_CONTRACT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00234 
00235 
00236       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00237 
00238   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00239       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00240   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00241 }

00244 
00245 void BtnInsPrevButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00246 {
00247       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00248       {
00249             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00250             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00251       }
00252       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00253       {
00254             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00255             {
00256                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00257 
00258                   if( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage > 0 )
00259                         gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage --;
00260 
00261                   ChangingInsuranceInfoSubPage( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage );
00262 //                fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
00263 
00264                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00265             }
00266       }
00267       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00268       {
00269             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00270             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00271       }
00272 } 
00273 
00274 void BtnInsNextButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00275 {
00276       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00277       {
00278             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00279             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00280       }
00281       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00282       {
00283             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00284             {
00285                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00286 
00287                   if( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage < (INS_INFO_LAST_PAGE -1) )
00288                         gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage ++;
00289 
00290                   ChangingInsuranceInfoSubPage( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage );
00291 
00292 //                fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
00293 
00294                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00295             }
00296       }
00297       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00298       {
00299             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00300             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00301       }
00302 } 
00303 
00304 void SelectInsuranceLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00305 { 
00306       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00307       {
00308       }
00309       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00310       {
00311             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT;
00312       }
00313       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00314       {
00315       } 
00316 }
00317 
00318 void SelectInsuranceInfoHomeLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00319 { 
00320       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00321       {
00322       }
00323       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00324       {
00325             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
00326       }
00327       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00328       {
00329       } 
00330 }

00333 void DisplaySubmitClaimPage()
00334 {
00335       wchar_t           sText[800];
00336       UINT16 usNewLineOffset = 0;
00337       UINT16      usPosX;
00338 
00339       usNewLineOffset = INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00340 
00341       //Display the title slogan
00342       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_SUBMITTING_CLAIM, sText );
00343       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_Y, 0, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00344 
00345       //Display the title slogan
00346       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_U_CAN_REST_ASSURED, sText );
00347       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00348       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00349 
00350       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_HAD_U_HIRED_AN_INDIVIDUAL, sText );
00351       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00352       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00353 
00354       //display the BIG FRAUD 
00355       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_FRAUD, sText );
00356       DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, (UINT16)(usNewLineOffset-1), INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_INFO_FRAUD_TEXT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00357 
00358       usPosX = INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X + StringPixLength( sText, INS_FONT_BIG ) + 2;
00359       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_WE_RESERVE_THE_RIGHT, sText );
00360       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00361 
00362       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_SHOULD_THERE_BE_GROUNDS, sText );
00363       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00364       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00365 
00366       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_SHOULD_SUCH_A_SITUATION, sText );
00367       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00368       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00369 
00370 }

00376   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;

00380

00382       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_PREMIUMS, sText );
00383       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X, INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_Y, 0, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00384 
00385       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_EACH_TIME_U_COME_TO_US, sText );

00387       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00388 
00389       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00390       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBulletImage );
00391       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00392 
00393       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_LENGTH_OF_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT, sText );
00394       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00395       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00396 
00397 
00398       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00399       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBulletImage );
00400       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00401 
00402       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_EMPLOYEES_AGE_AND_HEALTH, sText );
00403       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00404       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00405 
00406 
00407       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00408       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBulletImage );
00409       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00410 
00411       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_EMPLOOYEES_TRAINING_AND_EXP, sText );
00412       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);

00457 void DisplayCancelationPagePage()
00458 {
00459       wchar_t           sText[800];

00481 void DisableArrowButtonsIfOnLastOrFirstPage()
00482 {
00483       if( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage == INS_INFO_INFO_TOC) 
00484             DisableButton( guiInsPrevBackButton);
00485       else
00486             EnableButton( guiInsPrevBackButton );
00487 
00488       if( gubCurrentInsInfoSubPage == INS_INFO_LAST_PAGE - 1 ) 
00489             DisableButton( guiInsNextBackButton);
00490       else
00491             EnableButton( guiInsNextBackButton );
00492 }

00495 
00496 void ChangingInsuranceInfoSubPage( UINT8 ubSubPageNumber )
00497 {
00498       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00499 
00500       if( InsuranceInfoSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] == FALSE )
00501       {
00502             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00503             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
00504 
00505             InsuranceInfoSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] = TRUE;
00506       }
00507       else
00508       {
00509             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00510             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
00511       }
00512 }

00514 void DisplayInfoTocPage()
00515 {
00516       wchar_t           sText[800];
00517       UINT16 usNewLineOffset = 0;
00518   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00519       UINT16            usPosY;
00520 
00521       usNewLineOffset = INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00522 
00523       //Display the title slogan
00524       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_HOW_DOES_INS_WORK, sText );
00525       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INS_INFO_INFO_TOC_TITLE_X, INS_INFO_INFO_TOC_TITLE_Y, 439, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00526 
00527       //Display the First paragraph
00528       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_HIRING_4_SHORT_TERM_HIGH_RISK_1, sText );
00529       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00530       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00531 
00532       //Display the 2nd paragraph
00533       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_HIRING_4_SHORT_TERM_HIGH_RISK_2, sText );
00534       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00535       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00536 
00537       
00538       //Display the sub title 
00539       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_WE_CAN_OFFER_U, sText );
00540       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INS_INFO_TOC_SUBTITLE_X, usNewLineOffset, 640-INS_INFO_INFO_TOC_TITLE_X, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00541       usPosY = usNewLineOffset + 12;
00542       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X, usPosY, (UINT16)(INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_X+INS_INFO_SUBTITLE_LINE_WIDTH), usPosY );
00543 
00544       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00545       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00546 
00547 
00548       //
00549       // Premiuns bulleted sentence
00550       //
00551 
00552       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00553       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBulletImage );
00554       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00555 
00556       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_REASONABLE_AND_FLEXIBLE, sText );
00557       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00558       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
00559 
00560 
00561 
00562       //
00563       // Quick and efficient claims
00564       //
00565 
00566       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00567       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBulletImage );
00568       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X, usNewLineOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00569 
00570       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_QUICKLY_AND_EFFICIENT, sText );
00571       usNewLineOffset += DisplayWrappedString( INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, usNewLineOffset, INS_INFO_FIRST_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00572       usNewLineOffset += INS_INFO_SPACE_BN_PARAGRAPHS;
